item.title: Day 2 Observability - calls to other services
item.description: This post assumes you’re already familiar with OpenTelemetry, and are already collecting some observability data. Whether you’ve chosen automatic instrumentation, or manual, you’re now collecting telemetry data from your code. Congratulations ðŸŽ‰ But what about all the other code you’re using? When your service makes a database query, or fetches weather data, you’re using someone else’s code. These other services may have their own production problems - can you separate issues in your code from issues in a dependency with your current observability signals?
